projects.title: fertiCulture
projects.bodyText:
- Application developed using Kivy and Python.
 -  Utlizes machine learning and historical data to predict optimal crop for soil and environmental quality, or optimal conditions for a given crop.
 - Aimed at assisting homegrowers.

projects.title: A+ Student Management Systems
projects.bodyText: - A simple desktop app designed to practice interface creation and database connections / backend.

projects.title: The Dynamics Behind Exchange Rates
projects.bodyText: - Time series analysis and machine learning project that uses SARIMA models to predict the EUR-USD exchange rate with an error of 0.7%.
